SELECT YEAR(test_time) AS year, MONTH(test_time) AS month, AVG(TRI) AS average_value FROM glycerol WHERE test_time BETWEEN CURDATE() - INTERVAL 6 MONTH AND CURDATE() and user_id=#{userId} GROUP BY YEAR(test_time), MONTH(test_time), YEAR(test_time)*12 + MONTH(test_time) ORDER BY year DESC, month DESC;

SELECT TRI, test_time, test_day FROM ( SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER () OVER ( PARTITION BY date_format( test_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) ORDER BY test_time DESC ) AS row_num, date_format( test_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS test_day FROM glycerol ) AS RankedData WHERE user_id =#{userId} AND row_num = 1 ORDER BY test_day DESC LIMIT 7;
